questions.question: A prolonged P wave is an indication of:
A P wave with increased amplitude indicates:
Bundle Branch Blocks are seen on the ECG as:
Pacemaker stimulus appears on the ECG as:

answers.d: Does not appear on the ECG

answers.a: End of Q & start of R
answers.b: End of P & Start of PR Interval
answers.c: End of S & Beginning of ST Segment
answers.d: End of PR Interval & start of R Wave
